panels.description: 2 guys, a blond hair guy wearing glasses, a dark hair guy wearing hat, sitting at the office, with computers
panels.text:
Vincent: I think Generative AI are the future of the company.
Adrien: Let's create a new product with it.

panels.description: 2 guys, a blond hair guy wearing glasses, a dark hair guy wearing hat, sitting at the office, with computers, the blond guy looks intriguely at the dark haired guy
panels.text: Adriem: What do you have in mind?
